manifest.install:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_wdl_pyqqt_pay`; CREATE TABLE `ims_wdl_pyqqt_pay` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID', `uniacid` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '公众号标识', `origin` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '发起人', `want` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '支付人', `orderid` int(15) NOT NULL COMMENT '订单号', `price` float NOT NULL COMMENT '支付金额', `add_time` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '支付时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='支付记录表';
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_wdl_pyqqt_withdraw`; CREATE TABLE `ims_wdl_pyqqt_withdraw` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID', `uniacid` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '公众号标识', `openid` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '提现用户', `money` float NOT NULL COMMENT '提现金额', `discount` float NOT NULL COMMENT '提现手续费折扣', `fee` float NOT NULL COMMENT '手续费', `income` float NOT NULL COMMENT '扣手续费后的收入', `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL COMMENT '状态（0：提现中，1：已到账，2：已驳回', `pay_type` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '提现方式（1：企业付款，2：现金红包）', `ctime` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '提现申请时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='提现表';
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_wdl_pyqqt_pay`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_wdl_pyqqt_withdraw`;
